audioText: J'irai à la piscine demain matin pour nager une heure.
question: What will the speaker do tomorrow morning?
options: Go to the pool to swim for an hour.
Go to the gym to exercise for an hour.
Go to the park to run for an hour.
Go to the library to study for an hour.
explanation: The sentence says 'J'irai à la piscine demain matin pour nager une heure' - I will go to the pool tomorrow morning to swim for an hour. 'Irai' is the future tense of 'aller' (to go), and 'piscine' means swimming pool.
